SEARCH
Package control

Class ProjectManager

java.lang.Object
control.ProjectManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectManager
public class ProjectManager extends Object implements IProjectManager
The ProjectManager class manages all BTO housing projects in the system.

This singleton class implements the IProjectManager interface and provides:

  • CRUD operations for BTO projects
  • Project visibility management
  • Project filtering based on user eligibility
  • Project data persistence
  • Automatic project publishing
  • Flat unit inventory management

ProjectManager is a central component that maintains all project data and coordinates with UserManager for officer assignments and project ownership.

    • getInstance

      public static ProjectManager getInstance()

      Creates the instance if it doesn't already exist.

      Returns:
      The singleton ProjectManager instance

    • saveProjects

      public void saveProjects()
      Saves all project data to the projects.txt file.

      Writes each project's data as a pipe-separated line with all relevant details: project name, neighborhood, flat units, dates, manager, visibility, officer slots, assigned officers, auto-publish setting, and remaining units.

      Specified by:
      saveProjects in interface IProjectManager

    • getVisibleProjectsForUser

      public List<BTOProject> getVisibleProjectsForUser(User user)
      Gets a list of visible projects that a specific user is eligible to apply for.

      For applicants and officers, this method filters projects based on:

      • Project visibility
      • Application period being open
      • User eligibility for at least one flat type
      For HDB officers, projects they're assigned to are excluded.
      Specified by:
      getVisibleProjectsForUser in interface IProjectManager
      Parameters:
      user - The user to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      A list of visible projects the user is eligible for

    • removeProject

      public boolean removeProject(BTOProject project)
      Removes a project from the system.

      This method:

      • Releases all assigned officers
      • Removes the project from its manager's list
      • Removes the project from the system
      • Saves the updated data
      Specified by:
      removeProject in interface IProjectManager
      Parameters:
      project - The project to remove
      Returns:
      true if the project was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • autoPublishProjects

      public void autoPublishProjects()
      Automatically publishes projects based on their auto-publish setting and application open date.

      Projects are published (made visible) if:

      • They have auto-publish enabled
      • They are not currently visible
      • The current date is on or after their application open date
      Specified by:
      autoPublishProjects in interface IProjectManager

    • updateRemainingUnits

      public boolean updateRemainingUnits(BTOProject project, FlatType flatType, int booked)
      Updates the remaining units for a specific flat type in a project.

      This method is used when units are booked or released during the application process. After updating, the changes are saved to persistent storage.

      Specified by:
      updateRemainingUnits in interface IProjectManager
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update
      flatType - The flat type to update
      booked - The number of units to decrease from the remaining count
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
